BuffDesc: ['Set up jumping and wall-climbing content, and clear it to become a parkour master.', "Long time no see! It's time for the compilation of classic highlights!"]

BuffDesc: ['Defend against patrol machines.', 'A flash, like a shooting star, caught your attention.']

Name: Regular Battle VII
BuffDesc: ['"The gathered prayers will transform into newborn stars, illuminating the glorious path ahead!"', '"This is a flame of oath born solely for you."']

Name: Special Operation I
BuffDesc: ['A review system designed by Leonie. Quick clears and successful dodges can improve your rating.']
